alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stone, northeastern Searcy, southeastern Marion and south central Baxter Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rush, or 9 miles southeast of Yellville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thola... Elberta... Rush... Lion Hill... Big Flat... Alco... Oxley... Cozahome... Flag... Landis... Onia... Timbo... Harriet... Newnata... Push Mountian... Mull... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone
